1528380.name: Infinite Dungeon Crawler - Purchase Base Game
1528380.description:
This DLC unlocks the base game, which allows you to progress your characters beyond level 4, plus the ability to purchase expansion packs.

The following is included:
  • A wooded natural world to explore, fight monsters, and collect loot
  • 45 different monsters
  • Over 80 different types of weapons and shields
  • 7 different character races to choose from
  • Tons of facial features to customize your characters
  • 8 different character classes to choose from
  • Over 125 different abilities and spells
  • A ton of skills to help customize your characters
